website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung DV150F is a fairly capable dual-screen pocket camera with integrated Wi-Fi that delivers more features than its modest price would suggest.
cons: Grainy photos at higher ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: This camera is kind of ehhhh. I bought it to take on vacation with me and most of the pictures ended up blurry because I couldn't get it to focus. Now, it could just be that I'm too stupid to use the camera, but even my other family members couldn't get good shots from it. I did really like the front screen, it made taking group shots easier, but other than that I wasn't too impressed with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hailstorm

customer_reviews.title: Love it....
customer_reviews.text: A good little camera, lots of features for the price, the pictures come out really crisp and vibrant, it really fits well in a small purse or front pants pocket....what is a little bit of a let down is, its WiFi, it takes a few too many steps to log onto Hotel or New WiFi hot spots....also it doesn't save Facebook log-ins that easily....but I consider the whole on the fly WiFi an added bonus....easy to upload into my tablet/notebook and then Facebook from there....the pictures are really great, the video is truly HD and the sound is pretty clear....easy to sinc camera to a smart phone and then control it remotely...I love this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: California Dream

customer_reviews.title: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart WiFi Digital Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: Although this is supposed to be an older model. This camera is fantastic! It has a front and rear screen that shows REALLY clear pictures. It is a replacement for a WiFi digital camera that stopped working recently but had only a rear screen. With this one the person having their picture taken and the picture-taker BOTH see what will be snapped. Its good so that if the person who is getting their picture taken doesn't like the pose, they can change up. Awesome camera! She started taking pictures RIGHT AWAY and sending them online! Nice deal...it was supposed to be a Christmas present but she looked so lost without her camera...oh well! Nice price, fast delivery, and secure packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Dwranny

customer_reviews.title: Great for the young and not so young.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera as a gift to my 60+ parents, who had previously used digital Kodak cameras. My poor mother never had charged batteries (it took AA) and when she pressed the shutter, it would take several seconds to click, if it did at all. Flash? Who knows. Needless to say, with 4 young and fast grandchildren, she needs a better camera. I got this for them, because my dad likes to be a techie guy. This is the most techie camera I've seen- loading pics to facebook straight from the camera, and I didn't even have to teach them how to use it. Samsung is just that good. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sjriggs

customer_reviews.title: The flash is pretty good and has nice zoom
customer_reviews.text: If you take selfies this camera is for you. The small LCD screen on the front turns on and off with the simple push of a button on the top. The flash is pretty good and has nice zoom. The camera is small enough to slip into a pocket and not be bulky. The buttons are clear and easy to use. Its surprisingly durable, being used by mostly drunk college students it has been dropped, sat on, spilled on and is still working like the day we got it. Battery life is pretty much on par with other digital cameras despite the second screen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parashis

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre photos, kludgy wifi, broke in 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the price, I should have expected some of the issues I had. However, it crapped out after just 7 months. Lens won't open despite a variety of troubleshooting. The wifi connection wasn't as user friendly as I hoped, the quality of photos was below average. A few things I did like was the front facing LCD. Overall, maybe I got a lemon. Still, I think the camera is okay. I'd suggest spending a few more dollars and getting something more durable and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Over all it does take great pics and my daughter had a camera just like ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 3 because all the instructions are not in Enlish at all and it says that I am in another country when I try to sign it in to my wifi? I still cannot share pics unless i download them from the memory card that does not come with it.Over all it does take great pics and my daughter had a camera just like it so thats how we figured it out..or else I would have returned it.Picture wise its a 5 It still says I am trying to log in from Ireland there for will not let me use the wi fi option which that is dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Black?.... Samsung DV150F
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera with great resolution. I love the wifi feature on it for easy picture sharing. This is not intended for use in America because it comes with a euro style plug for the usb power cord. It Needs a 5w usb outlet plug so the one for my cell phone worked with no problem. The only thing I didn't like is it's supposed to be black. Even on the box it says black but looks dark blue.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Snappy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little camera for the short time it lasted (it got wet and exploded). The shutter would snap almost as soon as the button was pressed, which was great for taking pictures on the go (walking, riding a tram, etc.) While our other (more expensive) camera would have rendered blurry images, this one delivered fairly high quality shots in those situations with minimal blur. It is also small and lightweight, making for easy transport, and is ready to shoot within seconds of powering on.
customer_reviews.author: amazonamy

customer_reviews.title: love this little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little camera. It has so many features I'm still figuring out everything it can do! There's a kids mode that plays a cartoon on the front of the camera to get a little kid's attention when taking a photo! Quality is better than my iPhone 4 camera. Easy set connecting the camera to my iPhone and iPad, just follow the instructions. I also like the selfie feature, the front screen is just a really cool concept!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: such a good camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new digital camera because my phone just doesn't cut it for me anymore. I really like being able to see the picture with a front view and realized that cameras don't actually have that until i came across this one. Loving the front view option on a nice camera. Tons of features, however you cannot really use this camera without a memory disk but that was very cheap so not a big deal. Came with fully charged battery. Tons of fun so far playing with all the tools. You can even add a bit of makeup if you don't think you look your best. Best price I found and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: legbert

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight point and shoot camera. Still learning all the bells and whistles. Took some great pictures the other day, and with the Samsung start camera app. was able to transfer pictures to my smart phone and post them to Facebook. There are lots of options, panorama mode is cool. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AMT wrench

customer_reviews.title: The best camera at this price range, I love the front 'window' because it makes taking selfies a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: The best camera at this price rage, hands-down. I love the feature of having a little 'window' on the front of the camera, which makes it much easier to take accurate selfies. This is one of the few, perhaps the only, camera that has the front picture window. Other manufacturers should wise-up and include a little front window like this. An excellent camera in every respect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Camera works as it should, the order did not take long to arrive either. I wanted a camera to take many pics of my newborn son, I just wish I understood how poor the picture quality is. Disposable cameras have better picture quality, less blurry. It's as if this camera was made in the 1990's it's 2017 so I will just stick to the camera I have on my cellular phone.
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It takes great, clear pictures and has options for different frames to take pictures with the person right in it. I've not seen that before and I really love it! The reason I gave it 4 stars is because, as is with most digital cameras I've found, it doesn't take good pictures in low light, even with the flash. I've actually found that it takes better pictures in low light with the close up option (the little flower), than with the auto selection. It takes great videos too. It's a great little camera at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Criss G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it in the end
customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality not so good. I bought it to take on a trip so I wouldn't have my bigger camera bag with me, I wish I had brought my bigger camera. When it takes a good picture the are OK, but I had a lot of issues with smear looking, blurry pictures especially if what ever you are taking a picture of moves. I went to a zoo with my son and well, animals move sometimes it would take 3-5 shots before I got a good picture. I wouldn't buy this again. Either use your phone or buy a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The first dual camera I had I loved. And when me and my church member thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I Can't tell you how much I am enjoying my new camera! I can do so many things with it. The first dual camera I had I loved. And when me and my church member thought we both was holding it @ a Christmas Play December 2014 we both dropped it and I was sooo hurt. But I this one and when it said wifi, I said ok lets try it. I love this camera. It has wifi and it sends pics and mini videos through emails in the camera! I was MIss. Kodak before, but now My people call me Miss TECH lol. It's too much in this camera to talk about. I Love IT!
customer_reviews.author: Blackpearl1-N.Y./N.C.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for over a year now,and I love it!This camera has a great battery life,even to this day.I love having the front facing screen,it's useful for taking selfies.The purple color is just beautiful,the color has not chipped.This camera takes great quality photos!I take this camera with me everywhere!This camera takes Micro SD cards,and I have a lot of those so that isn't a problem for me.If you need a small and compact camera,I would definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: ... there but not a massive amount overall its a good camera just kinda disappointed the screen did that lol
customer_reviews.text: this camera has lasted about 6 years now all of a sudden the viewing screen has a big black spot has been used here and there but not a massive amount overall its a good camera just kinda disappointed the screen did that lol
customer_reviews.author: veloc85

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Ithis doesn't come with a manual, only a QuickStart and if you're like me, you think that's enough. It's not. Download the user manual. Takes nice pictures and has nice features. The only problem was that the delivery status said delivery on the 6th by 8 and "on time". So I had my Husband keep coming home from work to check as I was concerned about the rain. It never came until the next day. I wish they updated the delivery status as this was inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: rosey5300

customer_reviews.title: It's a small easy portable wifi enabled digital camera
customer_reviews.text: The shipment came really fast. I ordered it on friday afternoon and it arrived on sunday morning. I am purple holic and the color is really nice. I say overall the cost the shipment and quality of this product is nice. It's good for users who like to post pictures online esp. facebook by using wifi to upload on facebook. It can send e-mail with the photos you've taken straight forward with the camera. I would recommend people buying this, unless they want a high quality dslr equivalent camera, then you should just buy dslr.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: LCD screen failed after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera when it worked for the first 7 months. Then the LCD screen started fading, until it pretty much stopped working.The front LCD display works fine, though. I can still take pictures, as long as I don't mind not being able to see anything on the back LCD. If the screen was working, I'd give this camera 4-5 stars. However, I cannot give it more than 2 because of its poor reliability. I think a camera's LCD display should last longer than 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Help! Need better user manual..ill-tekk-erate!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this camera. I have, also left a review previous to this one...I have notified of a problem I am having, but have not had a response in 3 days now. I am very dissatisfied with the instructions that came with the camera. I am not a tekky and am seriously considering sending this camera back. Can some one please advise me on how I can get a better user manual so that I may learn how to operate this camera? Thank you Rosemary Giuliani
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Giuliani

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great point n shoot camera. Pictures are not perfect 100% of the time but this is a point n shoot not $1000 dslr. Great for taking selfies which is handy on vacations with my wife so we dont have to ask someone to take our pic. Has some nice built in features.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Camera is fine, but came with European plug!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I wanted it to be, but it arrived with a funny looking charger plug that I now realize is what they use in Europe, so that charger is useless to me here in America. Luckily, we have a bazillion other devices that use the same mini USB for charging, so finding another charger wasn't a problem. The included manual is pretty much worthless, but go to Samsung's website and you can download a much more thorough one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the features of this camera! This is for my 10yr old's Bday & we are still figuring out all the bells & whistles. We did purchase this as a refurbished one, but you cannot tell, besides the box it came in. I love all the photo options-selfie display in front, different frame modes, timer, many more to figure out still!
customer_reviews.author: Amber R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera but "delicate"?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for an awesome camera with nice features like dual screen & "magic frames" which allows you to take your pictures in fun frames like magazine & newspaper. The only thing is that after less than a month, it fell out of my pocket face down (lens side) on sandy ground & after that, lens would not come out. Good thing i bought accidental protection plan from Square Trade :)
customer_reviews.author: average jo

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is excellent and I really like all of the features
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent and I really like all of the features. it is easy to use and the image feature on teh front of the camera is really helpful. the only draw back that I have eperienced so far is the night time photo, are somewhat fzzy and not nearly as clear as my old camera. We do a lot of camping and it would be nice to have a better photo quality for night photos, especially when sitting around the camp fire. The zoom could be clearer as well, but to be honest, I have not used that much yet. So the vote is still out on that.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for snapping pictures in places that a smart phone might be damaged
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to have something that could be used on vacation and short day trips. It is a little better quality image than many camera phones but I don't worry about breaking it so much due to the low price. I take it down by the ocean and other less than friendly environments where I would fear my smart phone would be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Russ C

customer_reviews.title: unable to swith the default menu langue to English
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly camera, lost my camera charger. Cannot switch the default language to English, haven't use my camera
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend for a mom
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I love is that it's easy to transfer pics from your phone and computer and vice versa. The photo quality is poor. The auto is not that grrat. For moving kids and low light. It doesn't adjust or stabilize well. Buy a canon. They're better for beginners and people that just want to point and shoot and get great pics.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this little smart camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little smart camera. Takes great photos (and I'm no pro) and good quality videos. A friend purchased one and when I saw the quality of the photos and videos, I knew I had to have one. It has lots of options and is small enough I can take it in my tiny dance purse. I also purchased the SanDisc HD Micro Class 10 memory card as recommended by another reviewer. Great buy for the price and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsy 1

customer_reviews.title: Poor for outdoor, OK for inside
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these and they just break way too easy. The video quality is great, but drop it once from standing, and you are done for. Good for on tripod indoor use (has tripod screw on bottom), but use your cell phone for outdoor use. Plus the sound quality is terrible in even very little wind, and the mic is in a place where if you selfie you cover up the and mute the mic.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kane

customer_reviews.title: good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent camera and worth the price. I however have a windows phone, and the smart camera app isn't available for that. My easy fix though is to just email the photos directly to my phone. Kinda a pain, but oh well. The photo quality is so so, but I wasn't looking for anything top of the line. I do love the front facing camera display though.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Good for taking photos, extra features hyped.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best for night shots but a very good all round digital camera that is enhanced with the easy ability to take selfies. The transfer features are hyped though - I still find it easier to remove the memory card and transfer to the PC that way. Emailing photos via the camera is complicated.
customer_reviews.author: RX

customer_reviews.title: Decent Vlog Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for vlogging. Not the best quality for shooting vlogs but it is better than my old phone and isn't as bulky as my DSLR. Great entry level vlogging camera. The front facing camera screen, even though it is small, it is very helpful. I love the ability it has to sync photos just over Wi-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: very fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. The viewfinder is very small so the pictures look very fuzzy when taken. I was looking for a camera to replace my Iphone 5s which had a 8mp camera. My iphones 8mp camera gave me better pictures than this 16mp camera. I found I was much better served by going in person to a store and trying out different cameras before purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little camera! I am a single mom, so the selfie even on the front comes in very handy. Very easy to use, lots of functions, takes great quality photos. I love the convenience of the WiFi connection. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this camera. I just started using it and learning how to use the different features. This is my first digital camera since I have always used my iPhone. I love the wifi feature and the front view screen which is great for selfies. All the pictures come out great!. The front view screen is also great for taking pics of my nieces and nephews since it can play a cartoon to get there attention. A great price for a cool camera. My only dislike was that I could not email the videos I took, even though one was only 30 seconds long?? However, I am able to email multiple photos with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, really good price, takes beautiful and nice clear images. Easy to use and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Deisha Romero

customer_reviews.title: A little practice and you have a great camera.
customer_reviews.text: The front frame is very small and took me a few tries to figure out how to see the screen and push button at same time, awkward. The camera loads the pictures so great to my phone. Again, took me a few attempts to figure out where to tap the back of the phone to the camera. Directions aren't real clear. Both could be just me. Love love love how easy it is to upload the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Harrelmt

customer_reviews.title: this was a good camera
customer_reviews.text: It's been thru a lot. The wifi feature stopped working after it fell in the sea. Even tho the housing cracked, the camera continued working well. I've since given my daughter who is enjoying the many kiddy features.
customer_reviews.author: A. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Freezes up and won't take picture on occassion.  Not real friendly in setting mode, picture, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera. Had trouble figuring out how to put it back to a regular picture without a frame or one of the other options. I use it for my work. I am a real estate appraiser, and like something small, and wanted the rechargeable ion battery so I could charge it in my car instead of carrying batteries with me. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: pierson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the front view. This is the 2nd time buying this. I gave the 1st one to my brother who broke his and needed a new one. I missed this camera so I bought it again. It has wifi, you can edit and crop photos. I love this so much.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: I like the Dual view on this camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the Dual view on this camera. My son was impressed that I was able to email him a picture from the camera. It is a little smaller than I like but I find it easy to use and I was worried because it is so light I would have shaky picture but they are coming out fine. Great features on camera and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pink camera that takes GREAT pics!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!! I had originally seen this at Christmas my sister had one and I loved how you could take self pics with the screen on front! no more missing heads in my pics! LOL!! this camera is light and easy to use and it focuses well! I had a sony and let me tell you this thing is wayyy better than that!! all my pics come out clear every time, no more blurry pictures! I would highly recommend this camera! I LOVE IT!!!!!!!! you cant go wrong with this PINK one :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am Very happy with the Samsung DV150F purchase. This is my first camera without a viewfinder. I have only had it for a few days & have used it numerous times. So many options, love the dual screens, wifi & pictures look great. So much more to learn & I am excited about it. Nice to have so much packed into a light weight inexpensive camera. The only thing I was disappointed about was no user manual & the buttons on back of camera are also purple making it hard to read. Once I memorize what each button does then it won't be an issue. I Would recommend this camera to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: cute, compact, and packed with features
customer_reviews.text: Its very small, easy to hold and carry. It has a lot of features for editing photos and taking pictures in different lighting. The photos come out beautifully clear. It comes with a rechargable battery and usb cord. If you turn off the camera between uses, the charge will last for hours. And it doesn't take long to fully charge. I wanted something simple, compact, and easy to use...found it!!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: 43 good pictures then garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Took 43 really good pictures. After that all pictures were garbage. Super overexposed. Almost completely white. You can just barely make out an image. Called Samsung. They sent me a return label. Said it will be fixed or replaced in 5 to 14 business days. We'll see. Maybe I just got a dud. Seemed like a good camera for a good price at first.
customer_reviews.author: Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: the only reason I do not love it is the small size makes it hard for old hands to hold it, fear dropping it also you must go to menu to change from picture to film is not like other cameras I have it does put out a good film is a must. and the main thing I bought it for was the front screen to see where I am in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Tracey D.

customer_reviews.title: EUROPEAN WALL CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this camera for my girlfriend as a gift so I haven't personally had much of a chance to use it yet. It looks like a pretty decent camera so far. The one main problem that I will comment on that I ran into is that they don't tell you this comes with a EUROPEAN Wall Charger! ...We had to run out and buy the correct charger for this camera. You would think for a product sold in the US it would come with the correct equipment?!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: small point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I haven't yet taken the time to get this camera to do what it is capable of, and that I didn't realize when I bought it..the reviews were good..it didn't come with the memory card which I now have. I imagine I will like that it will stream photos for an easier download to the lap top and that I can also load pictures with the card.
customer_reviews.author: Marmar

customer_reviews.title: SO Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my nephew who is leaving the country for a couple of years. The WiFi sending is AWESOME. Even if he cannot get to a computer to actually write, he can send us pictures right from his phone. Light weight, and small, its perfect to fit in his backpack. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: quibecca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Newer models not always better the older one worked better for me
customer_reviews.author: hotcase24

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Camera felt sturdy but the picture was never as clear as the description or the product pictures were describing. I ended up returning the product as the iphone and selfie stick was way better. For great pictures, the Amazon Fire phone was actually the best. I used my friends phone on the trip and it out shined the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to deals

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera. It plays a cartoon video in the front to get a child's attention.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Camera. It plays a cartoon video in the front to get a child's attention. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: I was able to find them online but it would be nice to have a pocket version
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get instructions in English. I was able to find them online but it would be nice to have a pocket version. The buttons are a little small so it's touchy. I'm sure once I learn how to work it, it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Riley

customer_reviews.title: missing memory card..
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for my niece for her bday and she loved it , but she couldn't use it.. I checked the included stuff on box and even though It said a memory card was one of the items, there was no memory card. I had to go to rite aid during the party and get one.. other than that the camera is great.. front screen is soo cool and the color was perfect for her , she just turned 10 so it's great that it's easy to use too..
customer_reviews.author: bellatwins

customer_reviews.title: So excited!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my lady a nice camera for Christmas, she's only been asking for one for the last two years, but the one I found wasn't quite as nice as I was hoping for. Then I got lucky and caught this beauty on sale for half it's normal price, putting it squarely in my price range. I can't wait for her to open it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheers and Whatnot!

customer_reviews.title: The Camera Works Great, Linking To My Phone is a very Convenient ...
customer_reviews.text: The Camera Works Great, Linking To My Phone is a very Convenient Feature Of This Camera. I have No Complaints For This, It even is able To Use A Regular Phone Charger
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a European vacation, and it delivered well, took execellent selfies, was easy to switch from pics to video, easy to carry being small. The features are awesome particularly the share wi-fi feature. Only two cons. It doesn't save my email address so I have to enter it every time I send a pic and it doesn't allow me to label my pics when posting them on facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine P

customer_reviews.title: Best camera EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome camera...Bought one for myself 2 years ago. Loved it so much I bought one for my daughter. She loves her just as much. It takes awesome pictures and so easy to load onto the computer. Highly recommend and the price Is great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Crytzer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very reliable little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very reliable little camera. small, light weight. Love the front screen feature. Quality of photos is better than acceptable. Yes there are smartphones with better cameras and there are cameras with much better quality but if your smatphone doesnt have that much memory and you cant afford a $1200 professional camera, this will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jgomez

customer_reviews.title: goos camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the front screen. Ended up getting a smart phone soon after purchase, so use that much more, but this camera is great too. Only down fall so far is a slower shutter speed than my old camera and with kids constantly moving you miss some great faces. But still captures the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie Feemster

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size of it once it came and it has a lot of neat functions like wifi and the ability to connect with my phone, and a front screen for "selfie" shots but I can almost never get a nice clear image out of it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Self esteem boosted...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. We just needed a cheap camera for a trip to Vegas. It worked in the dark and was impressed with the video. The selfie screen was awesome and worked well for my facebook feed and all of the self esteem posting posts that I added to my feed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: If you are using a selfie stick this is the camera to use.
customer_reviews.text: If you are using a selfie stick this is the camera to use. Of course you can use your smart phone on a selfie stick, but the front camera on most phones have low picture quality. This camera solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Girl

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures for the size and
customer_reviews.text: Small and neat. Takes good pictures for the size and price
customer_reviews.author: Trell

customer_reviews.title: Nice size - Pocket/Purse Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like my camera but I don't love it. The snapshot button is a little difficult to press but I will adapt. The size is perfect for carrying on a daily basis and best of all I can email photos straight from my camera which is a big plus. I wish it came with a carrying pouch but I will find something.
customer_reviews.author: C. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Probably have taken thousands over the last year and a half and battery is perfect pictures are perfect and best of all I don't
customer_reviews.text: My wife takes pictures of everything, she loves this camera! Probably have taken thousands over the last year and a half and battery is perfect pictures are perfect and best of all I don't need to buy another camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Cory W

customer_reviews.title: Great canera
customer_reviews.text: The camera works good. It was easy to set it up with internet. Its also easy to transfer pics wirelessly to my ipad using the app. I like the fact that it wirelessly also syncs with other photo apps. I transferred pics and realised the pics were also in my dropbox.
customer_reviews.author: mommaoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! It's very small, so I can carry it anywhere at any time, w/out it feeling like a burden. Takes beautiful, crisp photos and the extras on this camera are wonderful. It's amazing that a camera this small has so many features. Great camera and great transaction!
customer_reviews.author: TMc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had a camera just like this! The only con is the image stabilizer - does work quite well but it's a neat little camera to capture all those moments! :D It takes great pictures and the dual sided part is also a great little tool have for those selfies, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Racine Azure

customer_reviews.title: Samsung DV150F Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera has performed as advertised. It is compact, light weight, and easy to use. I purchased the camera for a class my daughter enrolled in. The price is competitive. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a reliable digital camera at an attractive price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my birthday weekend. It arrived on time. The picture quality is great. The front LCD screen is convenient too! If only my phone supported the app for uploading the photos. But hey, that's not a camera issue, that's my old phone needing to be replaced! I would recommend this point and shoot to anyone looking for a simple to use, quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Saralymo

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 5s takes better pictures
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive, selfies Cons: Slow, bad autofocus, often blurry It's not bad if you want to take selfies, but they're not that much better than your smartphone's, even 16 megapixels to 1 megapixels on the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little good camera. Battery life is very good, easily last 8-10 hours. Takes pretty good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: zmorshed

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small point and shoot so we didn't have to carry out big cannon camera everywhere. Amazon had the best price out there and with prime it came quick. Works perfect for what we need it for, so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Georgean78

customer_reviews.title: small, compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a small camera with a lot of features. I love the wifi ability and it takes great pictures. I love the front facing camera. I got this as a supplement for my DSLR when I dont feel like lugging that around this is my go-to small camera
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: it's useless to me
customer_reviews.text: Among the "what's in the box": power plug. Yes, there's a power plug. What it doesn't tell you is that it doesn't fit US power outlets. I'm guessing it's an international plug? Whatever the case may be, it's useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price. I can email pictures immediately. I can post to Facebook immediately. I can email pictures to a friend immediately, but I can't have a friend post pictures direct to their Facebook accout. The picture quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my gf as a low cost camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my gf as a low cost camera with a front facing lcd for selfies, since they are all the rage right now!
customer_reviews.author: Gaia11

customer_reviews.title: Nice job site camera
customer_reviews.text: Needed a job site camera - hard to download photos as the usb can not read the memory stick in the camera as it did before automatically for my other older digital cameras... Maybe my computer is too old since It does not have built-in wifi =D
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a good quality camera for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: takes beauti pictures and is light weight for traveling. The only thing I can't figure out is how to record video for longer than 20 minutes. Other than that it is a good quality camera for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Vane

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera at a good price. Takes very good quality pictures. Only problem, owners manual came in six languages, none of which were ENGLISH. Downloaded Manual from Samsung Home page.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Not good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Returning!! To many blurry pics on "smart mode". Hd video was poor also on smart mode. For 16mp you should be able to "crop" in....nope all blurry. Features yes are nice but clear pics are way more important! This was our first day of use 3/1/2015 and last, lost many great pics to poor camera. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gabbani

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing :)
customer_reviews.text: I originally paid $65 for a refurbished camera off of Ebay and I was so thrilled to receive it, but it was defective and there were lines through the screen (waste of money, didn't get a refund). So then I get on Amazon (which is where I Should've gone first) and find this lovely little number and it is BY FAR one of the best cameras I've ever encountered in my life. Amazing HD and only $100 brand new in the box, that's definitely a steal! Thanks Samsung and seller, another satisfied customer would DEFINITELY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: QueenNathza

customer_reviews.title: I love the features and wifi capability
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my daughter. I love the features and wifi capability. She is going on a new York trip in march is so excited that she can sync it with her galaxy s3
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Camera came in the color I selected and was perfect. The camera itself is very, very small. Much smaller than expected, but takes great pictures and offers a lot of bells and whistles. For the price, you get more than you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gates

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenient direct WiFi email convenience!
customer_reviews.text: This cam is wonderful and recommended over a Canon product, I have two Canons. It works flawlessly in conjuction with WiFi to send pics immediately to friends...with no computer connection necessary.
customer_reviews.author: AMIGO DE MEXICO

customer_reviews.title: So far it is a great little camera
customer_reviews.text: So far it is a great little camera. Will be taking it on vacation soon so I probably would have a better report after that. I wish the manual was sent with the camera but I downloaded it & printed what I needed from it. Everyone loves the purple color.
customer_reviews.author: JR Country

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: It has more tricks than I could imagine. For example you can post to Facebook straight from the camera, and I think you can upload to your computer or tablet without a cord. Takes great pix too. Love the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: David May

customer_reviews.title: Good for a camera but horrible for video
customer_reviews.text: Good for a camera but horrible for video. You can only take 20min if video at a time. And to go from camera to video you have to go threw a bunch of settings to just turn the video recorder on. Takes good pics if that's all u need it for
customer_reviews.author: joanna spiesman

customer_reviews.title: BEST WiFi Camera! compact, east, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This little camera has been the best gadget purchase in a long time. You are able to do lots of things, having the front screen for selfies is pretty awesome. The WiFi works great and instantly is up on the web. I would totally recommend this to anyone that wants something light weight, portable, and easy to use. When we received the camera it came with foreign instructions so we went on line and downloaded the english version of them. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D

customer_reviews.title: i love this camera
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera. i keep it in my purse. the only down side is that the front view display is so small you have to squint to see it. it takes great pics for me and the vids come out great too.
customer_reviews.author: LIZZETT

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: THE SERVICE OF AMAZON IS EXCELLENT, FAST, SECURE, THE PRODUCT IS ALL RIGTH, MODERN, HIGH TECNOLOGY THE PRICE IS CORRECT. I RECOMENDED FOR ALL . GOOD SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: paulorojas

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This camera came quickly and was securely packaged. So far it has taken great pictures. Easy to use and navigate. The only downfall for me is the microSD card that is required. I have a DSLR, which takes the regular SD card. Hardly worth complaining about, but it is the only negative for me so far. We are going to Disney soon, so I look forward to seeing how the pictures turn out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shot
customer_reviews.text: It takes great pictures. I just can't read the instruction manual because it's not in English.
customer_reviews.author: angelgirl7

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing on a daily basis and I bought it a year ago. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Useful Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes quick pictures without sacrificing clarity or detail. Front facing screen is a must for couples that vacation on their own. Incredibly useful camera with a ton of features! This is the perfect point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Brophus

product_meta.title: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7" main and 1.48" front Dual LCD Screens (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteThe Samsung DV150F Smart Camera Dual View gives you two LCD screens, one in front and one in back, so you can easily capture perfect self-portraits and group shots. The stylish, compact camera features a high-resolution 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor and a fast 5x zoom lens, so you can get close to the action with amazing detail and clarity. Built-in Wi-Fi means you can share everything quickly and easily.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Samsung DV150F Smart Camera Dual View gives you two LCD screens, one in front and one in back, so you can easily capture perfect self-portraits and group shots. The stylish, compact camera features a high-resolution 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor and a fast 5x zoom lens, so you can get close to the action with amazing detail and clarity. Built-in Wi-Fi means you can share everything quickly and easily.

A 16.2-megapixel sensor provides crisp, high-resolution images. View larger.

The 2.7-inch LCD screen makes it easy to shoot and review your photos. View larger.

16.2-MEGAPIXEL SENSOR FOR CRISP, DETAILED PHOTOS
An advanced 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor allows the DV150F to capture incredible pictures with lifelike colors, great clarity, and crisp detail.

FAST 25MM WIDE-ANGLE LENS WITH 5X ZOOM
The built-in lens has a 5x zoom range so you can easily frame the shot you want and get in close to the action when necessary. The lens starts at a wide 35mm-equivalent focal length of 25mm, so you can fit in all the action when you're shooting, and zooms to 125mm for close-ups. And with a maximum F2.5 aperture, you can freeze fast action and take sharp shots even in dim light.

DUAL LCDS FOR PERFECT SELF-PORTRAITS
The DV150F has two LCDs, a 2.7-inch screen in the back and a 1.5-inch screen on the front. The front screen makes it easy to frame self-portraits--no more guessing and hoping you took a good shot.

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING AND FACEBOOK UPLOAD
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, transferring your images and sharing them no longer requires memory cards or cables. You won't have to worry about running out of space, either.

With the dedicated Direct Link hot key, you can connect to Wi-Fi networks. Once connected, you can save photos and videos directly to a computer or cloud service as you shoot. Print photos wirelessly or share them with your friends instantly by uploading them straight to Facebook or YouTube. With dual band Wi-Fi support, you'll have faster and more stable connections to the wireless networks around you.

CONNECT TO YOUR SMARTPHONE FOR MORE FEATURES
The DV150F works with Samsung's Smart Camera App (for iPhone and Android), which lets you instantly pair your camera with your smartphone and gives you features such as AutoShare and Remote ViewFinder.

When AutoShare is activated, all the pictures you take on your camera are automatically sent to your smartphone. Remote ViewFinder turns your phone into a viewfinder and lets you preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location from up to 30 feet away. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy.

CLOUD SERVICE BACKUP WITH MICROSOFT SKYDRIVE
Never worry about losing your photos, even if your camera is lost or stolen. If your camera is connected to Wi-Fi, the DV150F will automatically copy the images you take to a Microsoft SkyDrive account. This feature not only automatically backs up all your photos, but also lets you easily make more room on your memory card by deleting shots without fear you'll lose them.

SMART AUTO 2.0 FOR SHARP SHOTS EVERY TIME
The Smart Auto 2.0 feature automatically analyzes the current shooting environment and chooses the right mode to give you the best possible picture.

SHOOT HD-QUALITY MOVIES
Whether you're at the concert hall or a birthday party, grab the DV150F to take 720p HD-quality MPEG video at 30 frames per second.

COMPACT DESIGN FITS IN YOUR POCKET
The compact design of the DV150F makes it easy for you to slip it into your pocket and take it with you wherever you go. The DV150F measures 2.17 by 3.76 by 0.72 inches (H x W x D), and weighs 0.25 pounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
DV150F Smart Camera Dual View, Li-Ion Battery (BP70A), power plug, USB charging cable, wrist strap, startup guide, and warranty card.

DV150F SMART CAMERA DUAL VIEW
WHITE
AT A GLANCE:
 * Compact camera with front and rear LCDs
 * 16.2-megapixel sensor for crisp, high-resolution images
 * Fast, wide-angle lens with 5x zoom
 * Built-in Wi-Fi for easy sharing and data transfers
 * Captures HD-quality MPEG movies

Compact, slim design. View larger.

Automatically send photos to your smartphone with AutoShare. View larger.
feature_bullets: SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Direct Link, Mobile Link, PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All share, Cloud Service
